what.body5: To carry out this scientific study we use a limited amount of your information in addition to the ratings you make. These data include a randomly generated identifier (which we use to consolidate your ratings if you visit the app on separate occasions) and the language you have chosen to use. We store these data along with your ratings. If you are not comfortable with sharing this information with us then you should not proceed to the next page.
